mapper.select:
select d.bsc as bsc,t.cell,t.bspwrb,t.bspwrt, 'RLCPC:CELL='||t.cell||',BSPWRB='||t.bspwrb||',BSPWRT='||t.bspwrb||';' as command from rno_gsm_eri_cell t left join RNO_GSM_BSC_DATA d on d.id = t.bsc
where t.bspwrb = t.bspwrt
and t.city_id = ${cityId}
and t.bsc in (${bscStr})
order by d.bsc

select * from( select d.BSC,cell,ch_group,hop, RNO_GET_FREQ_CNT(dchno_32) as dchno, dchno_32 as dch, 'RLCHC:CELL='||cell||',HOP=ON,CHGR='||ch_group||';' as command from rno_gsm_eri_cell_ch_group t left join RNO_GSM_BSC_DATA d on (d.ID = t.bsc) where t.hop = 'OFF'
and t.mea_date = to_date('${date1}', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
and t.city_id = ${cityId}
and t.bsc in (${bscStr}))
where dchno > 2

select bsc, cell, ch_group, hop, dchno, dch, command from (select d.bsc,cell,ch_group,rank() over(partition by cell order by ch_group desc) as chgr_rn,hop, RNO_GET_FREQ_CNT(dchno_32) as dchno,dchno_32 as dch, 'RLCHC:CELL=' || cell || ',HOP=ON,CHGR=' || ch_group || ';' as command from rno_gsm_eri_cell_ch_group t left join RNO_GSM_BSC_DATA d on (d.ID = t.bsc) where t.hop = 'OFF'
and t.mea_date = to_date('${date1}', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
and t.city_id = ${cityId}
and t.bsc in (${bscStr}))
where dchno > 2 and chgr_rn > 1

select d.bsc, cell.cell, length(cell.active_32 || ',') nvl(length(REPLACE(cell.active_32, ',')), 0) AS active length(cell.idle_32 || ',') - nvl(length(REPLACE(cell.idle_32, ',')), 0) AS idle from rno_gsm_eri_cell cell left join RNO_GSM_BSC_DATA d on (d.ID = cell.bsc) where
cell.mea_date = to_date('${date1}', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
and cell.city_id = ${cityId}
and cell.bsc in (${bscStr})

select cell.mea_date create_time, bsc.engname as bsc, cell.cell, cell.maxta, cell.talim left join RNO_GSM_BSC_DATA d on (d.ID = cell.bsc)
where cell.maxta < cell.talim
cell.mea_date = to_date('${date1}', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
and cell.city_id = ${cityId}
and cell.bsc in (${bscStr})

select incell.bsc || '-' || incell.cell || '-' || decode(c.name,null,'空',c.name)|| '-' || decode(c.LONGITUDE,null,'空',c.LONGITUDE)|| ',' || decode(c.latitude,null,'空',c.latitude) cell, incell.bsic, incell.bcch from (SELECT bsc.engname bsc, cell, BSIC, BCCH FROM (select distinct c1.bsc, c1.cell, c1.ncc || c1.bcc BSIC, C1.bcchno BCCH from rno_gsm_eri_cell c1, rno_gsm_eri_cell c2
where C1.cell <> C2.cell
and c1.bcchno = c2.bcchno and c1.ncc || c1.bcc = c2.ncc || c2.bcc
and c1.mea_date = to_date('${date1}', 'yyyy-MM-dd') and c2.mea_date = to_date('${date1}', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
and C1.CITY_ID = = ${cityId} and C2.CITY_ID = = ${cityId}
and c1.bsc in (${bscStr}) and c2.bsc in (${bscStr})
ORDER BY c1.bcchno, c1.ncc || c1.bcc) t left join RNO_GSM_BSC_DATA d on (d.ID = t.bsc) ) incell left join RNO_CELL c on c.label = incell.cell

select bsc, cell, cellr, cellr_bsc, cs, 'RLNRC:CELL=' || cell || ',CELLR=' || cellr || ',CS=YES;' mml from (select substr(cell.cell, 0, 6) site, d.bsc, cell.n_cell cell, cell.cell cellr, cell.n_bsc cellr_bsc, cell.cs from rno_gsm_eri_ncell_param cell left join RNO_GSM_BSC_DATA d on (d.ID = cell.bsc) where
cell.mea_date = to_date('${date1}', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
and cell.city_id = ${cityId}
and cell.bsc in (${bscStr})
and substr(cell.cell, 0, 6) = substr(cell.n_cell, 0, 6) order by substr(cell.cell, 0, 6), cell.n_cell) A where not exists (select * from (select substr(cell.cell, 0, 6) site, d.bsc, cell.cell, cell.n_cell cellr, cell.n_bsc cellr_bsc, cell.cs from rno_gsm_eri_ncell_param cell left join RNO_GSM_BSC_DATA d on (d.ID = cell.bsc) where
cell.mea_date = to_date('${date1}', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
and cell.city_id = ${cityId}
and cell.bsc in (${bscStr})
and substr(cell.cell, 0, 6) = substr(cell.n_cell, 0, 6) order by substr(cell.cell, 0, 6), cell.cell) B where A.site = B.site and A.bsc = B.bsc and A.cell = B.cell and A.cellr = B.cellr and A.cellr_bsc = B.cellr_bsc and A.cs = B.cs)
